title: Francois Truffaut - Domicile Conjugal AKA Bed and Board (1970)
description:
upload by request

Francois Truffaut - Domicile Conjugal AKA Bed and Board (1970)

"Antoine Doinel is now 26. He married Christine, who teaches the violin. They will have a baby. In a new job, Antoine meets Kyoto, a japanese woman and fells in love with her. They have a love affair. Christine discovers it and Antoine leaves the house..."

Great little film from Truffaut, #4 in the Antoine Doniel series. 
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0065651/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0065651/</a>

---not my rip---

Okay this one was ripped to the wrong aspect ratio. I used mpeg4 modifier to correct that (not a perfect method), which means it will display properly in VLC at least, but still looks the same in Virtualdub and G-spot shows the original specs. Whatever you view it in, make sure to adjust the A/R to 16:9 if you can so things look right. I&#039;m only uploading this because it can&#039;t be found anywhere else.

As ripped, see the stick-man:

http://bayimg.com/image/jamojaabc.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/image/jamojaabc.jpg</a>
